languages.text: "Облил кровью Вольного Торговца и думал, что это сойдет тебе с рук? Ну уж нет. Вздернуть мерзавца!"

traits.locale_text: "Облил кровью Вольного Торговца и думал, что это сойдет тебе с рук? Ну уж нет. Вздернуть мерзавца!"

languages.text: "You drenched the Rogue Trader in blood. Did you expect to simply walk away afterward? I think not. Hang the scum!"
languages.original_text: "Облил кровью Вольного Торговца и думал, что это сойдет тебе с рук? Ну уж нет. Вздернуть мерзавца!"

traits.locale_text: "You drenched the Rogue Trader in blood. Did you expect to simply walk away afterward? I think not. Hang the scum!"
"You drenched the Rogue Trader in blood. Did you expect to simply walk away afterward? I think not. Hang the scum!"

"You drenched the Rogue Trader in blood. Did you expect to simply walk away afterward? I think not. Hang the scum!"
"You drenched the Rogue Trader in blood. Did you expect to simply walk away afterward? I think not. Hang the scum!"

languages.text: « Vous avez osé asperger de sang {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} et vous espériez vous en tirer à bon compte ? Perdu. Pendez-moi ce fumier haut et court ! »
languages.original_text: "You drenched the Rogue Trader in blood. Did you expect to simply walk away afterward? I think not. Hang the scum!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez osé asperger de sang {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} et vous espériez vous en tirer à bon compte ? Perdu. Pendez-moi ce fumier haut et court ! »

languages.text: «Acabas de empapar de sangre a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. ¿Esperabas irte de rositas? Ni hablar, ¡esposen a esta escoria!».
languages.original_text: "You drenched the Rogue Trader in blood. Did you expect to simply walk away afterward? I think not. Hang the scum!"

traits.locale_text: «Acabas de empapar de sangre a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. ¿Esperabas irte de rositas? Ni hablar, ¡esposen a esta escoria!».

languages.text: 「お前は自由開拓者を血まみれにした。何事もなくその場から立ち去れるとでも思ったのか？甘いな。クズを吊るせ！」
languages.original_text: "You drenched the Rogue Trader in blood. Did you expect to simply walk away afterward? I think not. Hang the scum!"

traits.locale_text: 「お前は自由開拓者を血まみれにした。何事もなくその場から立ち去れるとでも思ったのか？甘いな。クズを吊るせ！」

languages.text: “你让行商浪人满身是血，还以为能这么一走了之吗？我看不行。给我绞死这个人渣！”
languages.original_text: "You drenched the Rogue Trader in blood. Did you expect to simply walk away afterward? I think not. Hang the scum!"

traits.locale_text: “你让行商浪人满身是血，还以为能这么一走了之吗？我看不行。给我绞死这个人渣！”

languages.text: "Ihr habt {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} in Blut gebadet. Dachtet Ihr, damit kommt Ihr einfach so davon? Wohl kaum. Hängt diesen Abschaum!"
languages.original_text: "You drenched the Rogue Trader in blood. Did you expect to simply walk away afterward? I think not. Hang the scum!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} in Blut gebadet. Dachtet Ihr, damit kommt Ihr einfach so davon? Wohl kaum. Hängt diesen Abschaum!"

languages.text: "Hür Tacir'i kana buladın. Sonrasında hiçbir şey olmamış gibi gidebileceğini mi sandın? Hiç de bile. Asın şerefsizi!"
languages.original_text: "You drenched the Rogue Trader in blood. Did you expect to simply walk away afterward? I think not. Hang the scum!"
